alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:41PM EDT until August 12 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Coshocton County in east central Ohio... Central Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 641 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Berlin, or near Millersburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Dover, Strasburg, Sugarcreek, Gnadenhutten, Tuscarawas, Baltic, Midvale, Port Washington, Barnhill, Roswell, Parral, Stone Creek, Gilmore, Chili, Layland, and Bakersville. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 68 and 89. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Ohio. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
